name: Satisfactorio
title: Satisfactorio [BETA]
description:
[font=heading-1]WARNING[/font]
[font=default-semibold]This is a BETA BUILD.[/font] Although efforts have been made to test thoroughly, there may still be bugs.
Thank you for your interest, I look forward to hearing your feedback!

-----

Love Factorio? Love Satisfactory? Want to play both at once? Well all right then! This overhaul mod reworks Factorio to play more like Satisfactory, with Milestones, self-driving cars, direct connection of belts to machines, and much more!
author: Niet
